name: Nob Puzzles - Ultimate Jigsaw
description:
Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzles is one of the most popular logical reasoning games in the world. Discover a colorful world of jigsaws that fits in your pocket! This daily updated puzzle gallery with more than 20,000 HD pictures will help you relax your brain, avoid stress and entertain yourself and your family.

Over 6000 stress relief jigsaw puzzles in the app. New free puzzle games every day - a Daily Free Puzzle. This daily updated puzzle gallery with more than 20,000 HD pictures will help you relax your brain, avoid stress and entertain yourself and your family.

Features:

Over 10,000 beautiful, HD photographs, in more than 250 different packs!

• Get a new free puzzle daily!

• New puzzle packs added regularly!

• 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!

• Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!

• Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.

• A block puzzle FREE game for all android tablets or smartphones

• Simple controls make it easy to solve pictures!

Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzles are a great way to relax after a hard day and to train your brain. Play these brain games whenever you want.

You've never enjoyed puzzle apps so much before! Take your choice among epic photos, set the parameters and put together pieces of stunning landscapes, delicious food, seas, countries, cute animal puzzles, Christmas themes, art, Classic Jigsaw Puzzles and many other pictures on your tablet!

Please note! Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzles game is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.

Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzles is an epic free Jigsaw Puzzle Collection game.
